name: Killon
description:
Killon is a vertical scrolling manic shooter that features exhilarating combat and a special chargeable cannon waiting to be unleashed. Inspired by 90s shooters like Aleste, Truxton and Batsugun.

The government hunted you down to fly a star ship into war. Injected with a poison you must survive or die trying. Destroy the invading forces before they detonate their nuclear bomb.

  • 7 Super Stages
  • 5 Big Bosses
  • 4 Wild Weapons
  • Practice Mode
  • Boss Rush Mode
  • Unlockable Hard Mode
  • Local & Online Leaderboards
  • For Beginners, Seasoned & Hardcore Players
  • Blue Skies

Prepare to Launch
